title: Ice World: Los Angeles
description: It’s the end of the world and southern California is covered in ice. A stranger arrives and speaks of a place beyond Los Angeles where the weather is warm.
quote: Now the Ice Bishop of Beverly Hills will teach you the true meaning of cold!
altHero: the Ice Bishop of Beverly Hills
alt1: dudes with guns sledding by a highway sign that reads, “35 minutes to the ruins of Pasadena”
alt2: a post-apocalyptic crowd gathers by the remains of the Hollywood sign
